title._content: [Portrait of George Avakian in his office or home, New York, N.Y.(?), between 1938 and 1948] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of George Avakian in his office or home, New York, N.Y.(?), between 1938 and 1948] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 016 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Avakian, George Sound recording executives and producers--1930-1950. Music critics--1930-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1930-1950. Film negatives--1930-1950.
